document_data.name: ''Harp of the Beastmaster''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Harps of the Beastmaster''''' were enchanted instruments, created to be used by [[bard]]s, [[ranger]]s, and [[Harper]] scouts.
document_data.Powers: These ''[[harp]]s'' found wide use by the sea wolves and sea-faring adventurers for its ability to ''[[charm]]'' both beasts and men. Each ''harp of the Beastmaster'' allowed the wielder to ''[[charm person or mammal]]'' via its enchanted music three times a day, and ''[[dominate animal]]'' once a day.
document_data.History: After the [[Wailing Death]] of [[1372 DR]], ''harps of the Beastmaster'' could be found in several locations of the Nelanther Islands, namely sold at the [[The Monkey's Cutlass]] of Spindrift Town by [[Grogbeard McPherson]].
